definition: to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: But overhead smashes and stuff is always good fun, yeah.
sentences.chinese: 過頂扣殺之類的球確實總是很有趣。

sentences.english: He can hurl tennis rackets with deadly accuracy.
